name: modularity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of consisting of separate parts that, when combined, form a complete whole: A system lacks modularity when a tweak to one of its components affects the functioning of others. The modularity of this design means you can buy a second battery and put that in to keep your doorbell functional while the other charges.
More examplesFewer examplesThis modularity allows service providers to provide interchangeable user interfaces.The services are designed for modularity and flexibility based on the stage of implementation and area of greatest need.The issue of the modularity of the mind is at the centre of many theoretical debates.
